author: AceShowbiz.com
title: 'X-Men: Apocalypse' Official Synopsis Revealed
text:
Comments The official synopsis of the upcoming superhero movie has been included in a press release announcing a partnership between M&Ms and the movie. 
20th Century Fox and director Bryan Singer have teased a lot of details about the upcoming superhero movie " X-Men: Apocalypse ". This time, another detail comes from a press release created by M&Ms to announce a partnership with the movie. The press release contains the official synopsis of the film as well as a cute image of the Yellow and Green M&Ms candy-coated chocolates as Magneto and Storm. The press release says, "Since the dawn of civilization, he was worshiped as a god. Apocalypse, the first and most powerful mutant from Marvel's 'X-Men' universe, amassed the powers of many other mutants, becoming immortal and invincible." It continues, "Upon awakening after thousands of years, he is disillusioned with the world as he finds it and recruits a team of powerful mutants, including a disheartened Magneto ( Michael Fassbender ), to cleanse mankind and create a new world order, over which he will reign. As the fate of the Earth hangs in the balance, Raven ( Jennifer Lawrence ) with the help of Professor X ( James McAvoy ) must lead a team of young X-Men to stop their greatest nemesis and save mankind from complete destruction." The upcoming film, which centers on the newly-unleashed enemy Apocalypse, also stars Rose Byrne as Moira MacTaggert, Evan Peters as Quicksilver, Lucas Till as Havok, Alexandra Shipp as Storm, Sophie Turner as Jean Grey, Ben Hardy as Angel, Tye Sheridan as Cyclops, Olivia Munn as Psylocke and Lana Condor as Jubilee. The movie will hit U.S. theaters on May 27, 2016.
